name: VeryFields RFID
tag_list: rfid, database, rfid-tag, rfid-tags, hf, 18000-3, 15693, uhf, gen2, search-engine, technical-information, epc, leader-manufacturers, rfid-manufacturers, rfid-tag-manufacturers, rfid-tags-manufacturers, system-integration, system-integrators, aidc, autoid
overview:
VeryFields is free service designed to help RFID professionals find the best RFID tags for their applications. Registered users can define up to 50 RFID tag characteristics at a time and search among more than 1000 products from most of the leader RFID tag manufacturers world-wide.

For each product that appears in the search results, 5 links are provided:

  • RFID tag manufacturer official website
  • Integrated Chip manufacturer official website
  • RFID tag official datasheet
  • Integrated Chip official datasheet
  • VeryFields spec sheet (only registered users)

The VeryFields database contains passive UHF RFID tags, BAP UHF RFID tags and passive HF RFID tags to date. Active RFID tags and semi-passive RFID tags with sensors will be added soon.

The VeryFields Twitter account allows its followers to enjoy the most complete news stream about the RFID industry.

The VeryFields Blog offers news about the RFID tags and the tag manufacturers that enter the VeryFields database, information on new interesting products in the RFID market, interviews with RFID industry people and articles on the RFID technology in general.
